snippet: The N.C.A.A. turned down a third appeal by the University of Connecticut for a waiver of academic requirements, meaning the team may not play in next year’s postseason tournament.
abstract: NCAA turns down Connecticut's third appeal for waiver of academic requirements, meaning the university's basketball team may not play in next year's postseason tournament; other college basketball news noted.
